name: Minefield Renegade
description:
Setting:

You play as a renegade who was captured by the Galactic High Order. You have been taken to the outer reaches of space, given a makeshift ship, and sentenced to fly through the endless mines in the Delta sector of the Centurion Star System. Play your way through the minefield to see how far you can get. Death is certain. 

Controls: 

Move Left: A / Left Arrow

Move Right: D / Right Arrow

Shoot: Space / Left Mouse Button

Menu Navigation: Mouse to move around screen and Left Mouse Button to click on menu UI buttons

Note from the dev: 

This is my first project as a solo hobbyist/indie game developer.  This was a passion project to prove to myself that I could develop and create a full finished game. I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it.
